exceptions.tactic: intros a b c H1 H2 H3.

exceptions.exn: In environment a, b, c : nat H : a + b <> a + c H4 : b = c Unable to unify "b = c" with "False".

exceptions.tactic: rewrite <- Nat.add_cancel_r with (n := a) (m := b) (p := c).

original: intros a b c H1 H2 H3. intros H4. intro H5. apply H4. rewrite <- Nat.add_cancel_r with (n := a) (m := b) (p := c). rewrite Nat.add_comm. rewrite <- Nat.add_cancel_r with (n := a) (m := c) (p := b). rewrite Nat.add_comm. apply H5.
